2019-03-17 - ramlat new method

T480s - x86_64 - i7-8650U at 3.0 GHz - DDR4-2400 2chan-1bank
$ ./ramlat -n -s
   size:  1x32  2x32  1x64  2x64 1xPTR 2xPTR 4xPTR
     4k: 1.671 1.671 1.985 1.985 1.337 1.338 1.339 
     8k: 1.672 1.672 1.985 1.986 1.341 1.337 1.337
